document_data.name: Sphere of Wonder
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sphere of wonder''''' was a [[wizard]] [[spell]] from the schools of [[alteration]] and [[evocation]].
document_data.Usage: This spell created a stationary sphere of magical ''[[light]]'' measuring {{SI|90|ft|long=yes}} in diameter. The sphere blocked all spells and [[magic item]]s from functioning within its borders. However, at the time of casting the caster could choose to allow certain types of spell or magic items to work properly. The caster could select fire-based spells to function for example.
document_data.Components: This spell only required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components to cast.
